localFilePathRequestText: Please, state the path to the text file. LOL
webPageUrlAddressRequestText: Please, state the URL of the source website.
invalidInputNotificationText:
Unfortunately, we cannot interpret your input.
Please, check its consistency and try again.
readingSessionFailureNotificationText:
Attempt to receive data from the given source resulted in a failure.
Please, try again later!
unknownErrorNotificationText:
Something went wrong whilst processing your request.
Please, check the consistency of your input or try again later!
